# Covid Tracker

Web app to track COVID-19 cases in France.

## Tech Stack

This project constitutes a sort of an REST API-backed Single Page
Application (SPA).

### Front-End:
- Angular 9
- Angular Material UI
- Angular Flex-Layout

## Development

To start the Angular Webpack dev-server on `localhost:4200` execute:
```
./gradlew npm_start
```
